name: Hero Line Wars
description:
Hero Line Wars is a game where players spawn monsters to invade the enemy's base.

Spawning monsters costs gold but adds to your income that is given every 20 seconds. 

Once 15 creeps have reached the enemy's base, he will lose. Additionally, a player can buy and cast powerful spells to disrupt the enemies' game.

This game is suppose to be played in mobile, an APK for android will be uploaded soon.
